ingredients: Green vegetables: green onions, dill, cilantro, and parsley
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl.
Add chopped green onions (after washing, of course).
Incorporate a small amount of chopped parsley, chopped dill, and chopped cilantro, and mix well with the eggs.
Heat a skillet over low heat and pour in the mixture. Cook until the bottom is set, then carefully flip with a spatula and cook the other side until firm.
notes: This dish is a traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish recipe, perfect for a light meal or breakfast.
